Title: Relates to prohibiting retroactive minimum conditions of employment
Summary: Relates to prohibiting retroactive minimum conditions of employment; provides that the employment of an employee who met the minimum qualifications or conditions for employment at the time of appointment may not be terminated or separated from service based on any new qualifications or conditions of employment enacted after the date of appointment to such civil service position.
LawCode: Add ยง54-a, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to prohibiting retroactive minimum conditions of employment
